alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 27 at 8:48AM PDT until March 28 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
